channel.title: API on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in API on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: Posting to Bluesky from R
item.description: With the recent mass exodus from Xitter, Bluesky has emerged as a new home for the R community. Discover how to join the community with starter packs and automate posting to Bluesky from R using GitHub Actions. Explore detailed steps for setup and automation, making it easy to share your latest blog posts on social media platforms.

item.title: Creating post summary with AI from Hugging Face
item.description: Optimize your blog’s SEO and Zenodo metadata with automated summaries using Hugging Face’s text summarization models. Learn how to connect to the Hugging Face API, prepare content, and integrate summaries into your markdown files using R and the httr2 package.
